title: Application of the Deffuant model in money exchange. (arXiv:2307.02512v1 [q-fin.MF])
abstract: A money transfer involves a buyer and a seller. A buyer buys goods or services from a seller. The money the buyer decreases is the same as that the seller increases. At each time step, a pair of socially connected agents are selected and transact in agreed money. We evolve the Deffuant model to a money exchange system and study circumstances under which asymptotic stability holds, or equal wealth can be achieved.

translated_title: Deffuant模型在货币交换中的应用
translated_abstract: 货币交易涉及到买方和卖方。买方从卖方购买商品或服务。买方减少的金额与卖方增加的金额相同。在每个时间步骤中，选择一对社会相连的代理人进行交易。我们将Deffuant模型演化为一个货币交换系统，并研究在何种情况下可以实现渐近稳定性，或实现财富均等。
tldr: Deffuant模型应用于货币交换，研究了如何实现渐近稳定性和财富均等。
en_tdlr: The Deffuant model is applied to money exchange, investigating how to achieve asymptotic stability and equal wealth.
